content: The Violet Hail Transformation in Black Myth: Wukong is quite well-hidden, located behind a secret boss within the secret area of Purple Cloud Mountain in The Webbed Hollow.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Violet_Hail_(Transformation).md', within the main section titled 'Violet Hail (Transformation)'.
The content is as follows:
The Violet Hail Transformation in Black Myth: Wukong is quite well-hidden, located behind a secret boss within the secret area of Purple Cloud Mountain in The Webbed Hollow.
